title: Snow camp
creator_credit: National Fitness Council of Tasmania and Tasmanian State Film Unit
brief_description: Aimed at the experienced bushwalker, this film discusses survival in the snow country. Includes instructions on the building of igloos and other shelters. Suitable for upper secondary and teertiary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: National Fitness Council of Tasmania and Tasmanian State Film Unit
description: Aimed at the experienced bushwalker, this film discusses survival in the snow country. Includes instructions on the building of igloos and other shelters. Suitable for upper secondary and teertiary levels.
